body.p: Born in Harrisburg, Dauphin County, Pennsylvania. He was the president of the Bank of the State of Indiana branch in New Albany, Indiana in 1860 and 1863. Became a part of the Lincoln Campaign Club in New Albany in 1860. McDonald was also involved in the Pork packaging industry. Died in New Albany, Floyd County, Indiana.
